Description: The following statement contains a magic number: menu.AddItem(new MenuItem("sleep"' "Pause between pastes (seconds)").SetValue(new Slider(0' 0' 15)));

The following statement contains a magic number: if (menu.Item("paste").GetValue<KeyBind>().Active)              {                  if (linestoprint == null)                  {                      Game.Say(contents);                  }                  else                  {                      foreach (string s in linestoprint)                      {                          Game.Say(s);                      }                      var linestoprintsize = contents.Count();                      Array.Clear(linestoprint' 0' linestoprintsize);                  }                  var sleep = (menu.Item("sleep").GetValue<int>()) * 1000;                  if (sleep != 0)                  {                      System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(sleep);                  }              }
